name: Faller (jatinrx, elit3333, afteraryan, AvinashChoudhary, GamedevVishal)
description:
We started this game while participating in Epic MegaJam 2021, but due to some technical limitations, we couldn't upload it on time. So, after working for another few days, we finally completed and enhanced the game. 

We took 10 days to make the game learnt a lot of new stuff and gained crazy experience.

It is a puzzle game, based around maze, lasers, and mirrors.

Have Fun🙌

Tip - Please read the instructions carefully
